Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{3: 'Seven days later.'}
{3: 'In an empty room at WGAA.'}
{3: 'Gathered around an aged projection device, everyone takes a seat on the ground, patiently waiting for the calibration to be done.'}
{3: 'While Liv and Lucia walk in, each holding a plate of rice dumplings in their hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv & Lucia', 3: 'Anyone wants rice dumplings?', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hey, don't suddenly stand up like that. You're blocking the projector.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oops, my bad. Couldn't help but move around a bit after sitting here for so long.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'You think I want this? You should go blame WGAA for still using such an outdated thing.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hehe, this is what a premiere is all about. Gotta stick with the tradition.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Now that you've mentioned it, Ayla, is the movie going to be released today?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hm? Well, of course! It's the Dragon Boat Festival holiday, after all.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Huh? Shouldn't you have had us double-check it beforehand...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Come on, have a little more faith in me. Director Ayla's got some professional editing skills.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I've worked hard editing scenes where you accidentally hit your allies, missed close-range dagger shots, or blew yourself sky-high while playing with explosives.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Uh... I really don't want to remember those...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You know, they are just some little unintentional mistakes!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, do you want to try a rice dumpling?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ah, thank you, Liv.', 3: '36'}
{2: '(Take a bite of the rice dumpling...)', 3: '37'}
{3: "It's very delicious."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I tried to recreate the original based on the recipe Changyu gave me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm very happy that you like it, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The steaming hot rice dumplings emit an enticing aroma, alluring enough to make one ignore the burning heat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'At the end of the day, a new ending was still added on top of the results of the game.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It makes sense since the hero spotted us before reaching the Realm of Dragons, which caused our mission to end early in the game.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'It was quite a fun journey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes.', 3: '49', 4: "It's a pity that there was no Spectral Dragon with 3000 HP...", 5: '201'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'As absurd as usual, but well... the ending is not bad.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We don't need to continue with this topic anymore.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Depending on how well the movie is received in Babylonia, we may need to make another sequel again.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not just for next year, but also for the year after next, and the year after the year after that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh, sorry, I got carried away for a moment.', 3: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is there anything bothering you?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Shake head to deny)', 3: '64'}
{2: "Not at all. I'm just thinking about the following years...", 3: '65'}
{3: '"I just want us all to still be together and enjoy the happy moments."'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm sure we will be able to do that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's what I think, too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Judging by our current circumstances, it will be like that indeed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Regardless of the passage of time and the numerous hardships endured.'}
{3: 'The unbreakable bond of friendship will eventually guide you and your friends together, allowing you to overcome the raging fires of war and the freezing winters.'}
{3: 'You only wish that by then, you will still be able to see every familiar face, united once more by this table.'}
{3: 'No... Rather than a mere prayer, this is now your mission as a commandant, a duty you must strive to fulfill...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hey, I've done setting up the projector.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Be quiet for a moment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "The premiere of this year's Dragon Boat Festival movie now begins!", 4: '1'}

{3: 'The applause carries a diverse range of tones, with some sounding urgent, others nonchalant, and one person even momentarily clapping their hand on a rice dumpling before finding a moment to set it aside.'}
{3: 'However, without exception, everyone is wearing a smile in this very moment.'}
{3: 'The wishes are as heartfelt as always...'}
